articles.description: If you're worried about your kids' mental health, particularly because of the Covid-19 pandemic and social distancing mandates, less screen time and more extracurricular activities will help, says a new study.

articles.title: Are infections seeding some cases of Alzheimer's disease? - Nature.com
articles.description: A fringe theory links microbes in the brain with the onset of dementia. Now, researchers are taking it seriously.
